directions.text: Combine marmalade, soy sauce, honey, ginger and diced garlic in a saucepan.
Heat over medium until boiling stirring frequently until half it's volume, set aside.
Cut pineapple, veggies, and chicken up in bite size pieces.
Thread each piece through a skewer, wrapping chicken with bacon.
Baste kabobs and grill on each side for about 8 minutes.
